Q17: According to the policy, the claim should include appropriate documentation of the patient's clinical presentation (proximal muscle weakness, elevated CK, waddling gait, family history of muscular dystrophy) to demonstrate medical necessity. The test should be ordered using the appropriate CPT code (81448 for hereditary peripheral neuropathies panel or another applicable code for muscular dystrophy panel). Medical records documentation may be required to assess whether the member meets the clinical criteria for coverage.
